alert.note: Alert for Beauregard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 7:29PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Kinder Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Mermentau River Near Mermentau Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 97.0 feet, Minor flooding begins around the lake, especially the north end of the lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 96.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Tuesday morning and continue rising to a crest of 97.2 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 97.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Bundick Creek Bundick Lake 97.0 96.6 Sun 6 pm CST 96.8 97.1 97.2 &&
